osyfe.graphic

Class Shader

  • java.lang.Object
    • osyfe.graphic.Shader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Deletable

    public class Shader
extends java.lang.Object
implements Deletable
    Represents a shader program. Note that a shader has to be bound before setting uniforms.

      • Z_FAR

        public static final java.lang.String Z_FAR
        Camera zNear and zFar (set by a framebuffer).
        depth_linear = zNear / (zFar - zNear) * (zFar / (zFar * (1 - sampled) + zNear * sampled) - 1)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • Z_NEAR

        public static final java.lang.String Z_NEAR
        Camera zNear and zFar (set by a framebuffer).
        depth_linear = zNear / (zFar - zNear) * (zFar / (zFar * (1 - sampled) + zNear * sampled) - 1)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • uniformTexture

        public int uniformTexture(java.lang.String name,
                          Texture texture,
                          boolean lock)
        Sets a sampler uniform and returns its unit id. If locked, it won't be overridden after the next 32 sampler settings.
